response.overview: Robert Bontrager - Follow astronomer Dr. Hugh Ross on a journey through the stars as he examines the evidence to prove that, in a vast array of seemingly lifeless galaxies, humans are an uncommon find. Bonus features include the short film "Who Is the Creator? Testing Religious Revelations," featuring a conversation between Ross and Greg Koukl (founder and president of the Christian group Stand to Reason) about religious claims and the scientific record. -  Hugh Ross
response.title: Journey Toward Creation
